snippet: Using talent and attitude, Tampa Bay has grown from a pushover to a power, leading a division in which all five teams are over .500.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column observes that the Tampa Bay Rays, using talent and attitude, have grown from a pushover to a power, leading a division in which all teams are over .500.
lead_paragraph: Using talent and attitude, Tampa Bay has grown from a pushover to a power, leading a division in which all five teams are over .500.

headline.seo: Tampa Bay Rays’ Sharp Rise Has Come Since a Hard Slide
headline.main: Since a Hard Slide, a Sharp Rise for the Rays
headline.print_headline: Since Hard Slide, Sharp Rise for Rays
